MetaData.Description: These are meta data for this event. Not intended to use in ML algorithm

TruthTriggerFlag.Description: These are categorical true/false MonteCalo truth tags for the event. These are only known in training sample. This would be trigger output in real data processing.

RawHit.Description: Raw data in the event in an unordered set of hit ID. To help in visualization stage, the coordinate of the hit is also appended. These would be input in real data.

TruthHit.Description: From the MonteCalo truth information, pairs of track ID and subset of RawHit that belong to the track. These are not presented in real data. The track ID is arbitary.
